item.title: Gluten-free cornbread (with almond meal)
item.description: One can’t have Thanksgiving without cornbread. This recipe comes as a surprise: I picked up a bag of almond meal whilst shopping and decided to try it as a straight substitute for flour in cornbread. Normally, I use some combination of tapioca flour, garbanzo flour, masa, or any of the other GF powders I have lying around. With almond meal in hand, I surfed up a couple of recipes, and used this one for inspiration.
